entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 3:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling

Dewpoint: -0.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
